documentation.text: Base contract for all Secret Store services.
Only pass when fee is paid.
Only pass when 'valid' public is passed.
Constructor.
Return number of key servers.
Return index of key server at given address.
Drain balance of sender key server.
Deposit equal share of amount to each of key servers.
Returns true if response from given keyServer is required.
Insert key server confirmation.
Clear responses before removal.
Remove request id from array.
Reset responses.
Base contract for all Secret Store services.
Only pass when fee is paid.
Only pass when 'valid' public is passed.
Constructor.
Return number of key servers.
Return index of key server at given address.
Drain balance of sender key server.
Deposit equal share of amount to each of key servers.
Returns true if response from given keyServer is required.
Insert key server confirmation.
Clear responses before removal.
Remove request id from array.
Reset responses.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

drain().notice: Drain balance of sender key server.

requireKeyServer(address).notice: Return index of key server at given address.

userdoc.notice: Base contract for all Secret Store services.
